tool.name: SCENIC
tool.description: infers gene regulatory networks from gene expression data.
tool.command:
scenic.R -i "$input_expr_matrix" -m "$input_motifs" -o "$output_dir" -c "$num_cores" ]]</command>
<inputs> <param name="input_expr_matrix" label="Input expression matrix" type="data" format="tabular" required="true" /> <param name="input_motifs" label="Motifs file" type="data" format="tabular" required="true" /> <param name="num_cores" label="Number of cores" type="integer" value="1" min="1" help="Number of cores to use for parallel processing." /> </inputs>
<outputs> <data name="regulons" label="Regulons" format="loom" /> <data name="cor_matrix" label="Correlation matrix" format="tabular" /> <data name="enrichment_scores" label="Enrichment scores" format="tabular" /> </outputs>
<help> This tool runs the SCENIC algorithm to infer gene regulatory networks from gene expression data. </help>
</tool>
